name: search
description: search allows the assistant to search for information.

args.description:
Arguments to accompany command.
searchwiki: string search eg `why is the sky blue` or specific topic 
getwiki: title
getwikisectionlist: title
getwikisections: title followed by the headings with `|` as a separator eg. `Diffuse sky radiation|Under an overcast sky|The diffused skylight effect`
getwikisummary: title
google: string search query

command.description:
Available commands:
searchwiki: searches Wikipedia and returns a list of titles along with a snippet and the pageid
getwiki: returns text of Wikipedia entry
getwikisectionlist: returns a list of the sections in the Wikipedia entry
getwikisections: returns text from specific sections in the Wikipedia entry
getwikisummary: returns a summary of the Wikipedia entry
google: searches a database and returns the link titles, links, and a small summary
